courses.description:
CP-GY 5990 Internship Seminar 
Internship Seminar provides career development, job search basics and resume development in a seminar setting, arranged with the Wasserman Center for Career Development. This course is open to both undergraduate and graduate students.
CP-GY 9000 SEMINAR FOR GRADUATE COOP PRACTICUM

CP-GY 9911 Internship for MS I 
Internship is a supervised, creative experience that provides full-time graduate students with the opportunity to enhance and augment classroom learning experiences in their field of study. The experience culminates in written reports, from the student, to the faculty supervisors as well as written reports from the supervisor. | Prerequisites: Advisor's approval.

CP-GY 9921 Internship for MS II 
Internship is a supervised, creative experience that provides full-time graduate students with the opportunity to enhance and augment classroom learning experiences in their field of study. The experience culminates in written reports, from the student, to the faculty supervisors as well as written reports from the supervisor. | Prerequisites: Advisor's approval and CP-GY 9911

CP-GY 9941 Internship for PhD I 
Internship is a supervised, creative experience that provides full-time graduate students with the opportunity to enhance and augment classroom learning experiences in their field of study. The experience culminates in written reports, from the student, to the faculty supervisors as well as written reports from the supervisor. | Prerequisites: Advisor's approval

Internship is a supervised, creative experience that provides full-time graduate students with the opportunity to enhance and augment classroom learning experiences in their field of study. The experience culminates in written reports, from the student, to the faculty supervisors as well as written reports from the supervisor. | Prerequisites: Advisor's approval and CP-GY 9941

Internship is a supervised, creative experience that provides full-time graduate students with the opportunity to enhance and augment classroom learning experiences in their field of study. The experience culminates in written reports, from the student, to the faculty supervisors as well as written reports from the supervisor. | Prerequisites: Advisor's approval and CP-GY 9951

The experience culminates in written reports, from the student, to the faculty supervisors as well as written reports from the supervisor. | Prerequisites: Advisor's approval and CP-GY 9961
